sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Compulsory Retirement of Judges Act.

sections.heading: A judge is automatically retired at the expiration of the term
sections.text:
in which the judge attains the age of 75. Such judge shall conclude all
matters pending before him unless the Supreme Court makes other provisions
for the disposition of such matters. This Section shall apply to all
Supreme Court, appellate, circuit and associate judges.
